compressiontweaks.jei.bouldercategory_yi: Drops %s ores from the Primary Resources list
Drops 64 blocks of the previous tier (Tectonic), 16384 ores in total.
compressiontweaks.jei.bouldercategory.in: These ores can be found on the outermost layer of the boulder and only yield the basic mineral or raw ore (also listed here)
These are the main blocks forming the core of the boulder. They can be found in denser and denser layers. Each layer is more difficult to mine than the last, but yields more.

These ores drop from the conglomerates and are the most important resource from them. On average, you will get a million of these from mining out an entire boulder. They can be processed in increasingly scaling methods, with each tier quadrupling the yield.
These are not ores, but are present in the boulder and could prove useful, providing a decent supply of certain resources.
